title: Relates to investigations and inspections by the department of housing preservation and development in NYC
summary: Permits the state division of housing and community renewal to authorize investigations and inspections of certain dwellings by the department of housing preservation and development in NYC.

       AN  ACT  to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seven-
         ty-four, the emergency housing rent control law and the New York  city
         charter,  in relation to investigations and inspections by the city of
         New York

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1. Subdivision a of section 12 of section 4 of chapter 576 of
    2  the laws of 1974, constituting the emergency tenant  protection  act  of
    3  nineteen  seventy-four is amended by adding a new paragraph 9 to read as
    4  follows:
    5    (9) THE STATE DIVISION OF HOUSING AND COMMUNITY RENEWAL MAY  AUTHORIZE
    6  THE  DEPARTMENT  OF  HOUSING PRESERVATION AND DEVELOPMENT IN THE CITY OF
    7  NEW YORK, OR ITS SUCCESSOR AGENCY, TO EXERCISE  ANY  OF  THE  DIVISION'S
    8  POWERS UNDER THIS ACT WITHIN THE CITY OF NEW YORK, PURSUANT TO AGREEMENT
    9  WITH THAT DEPARTMENT OR AGENCY.
   10    S  2.  Subdivision  1 of section 6 of chapter 274 of the laws of 1946,
   11  constituting the emergency housing rent control law, as amended by chap-
   12  ter 337 of the laws of 1961, is amended to read as follows:
   13    1.   (A) THE STATE DIVISION  OF  HOUSING  AND  COMMUNITY  RENEWAL  MAY
   14  AUTHORIZE  THE DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING PRESERVATION AND DEVELOPMENT IN THE
   15  CITY OF NEW YORK, OR ITS SUCCESSOR AGENCY, TO EXERCISE ANY OF THE  DIVI-
   16  SION'S  POWERS  UNDER  THIS LAW WITHIN THE CITY OF NEW YORK, PURSUANT TO
   17  AGREEMENT WITH THAT DEPARTMENT OR AGENCY.
   18    (B) The commission is authorized to make  such  studies  and  investi-
   19  gations, to conduct such hearings, and to obtain such information as the
   20  commission  deems  necessary  or proper in prescribing any regulation or
   21  order under this act or in the administration and  enforcement  of  this
   22  act and regulations and orders thereunder.

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets

    1    S  3. Section 1802 of the New York city charter is amended by adding a

    3    7.  ALL  POWERS,  RIGHTS  AND  DUTIES AUTHORIZED BY AND PURSUANT TO AN

    8    S  4. Severability.   If any provision of this act, or any application
    9  of any provision of this act, is held to  be  invalid,  that  shall  not
   10  affect the validity or effectiveness of any other provision of this act,
   11  or  of  any  other application of any provision of this act or any other
   12  provision of any law or code amended by this act.
   13    S 5.  This act shall take effect immediately; provided that the amend-
   14  ments to section 12 of the emergency tenant protection act  of  nineteen
   15  seventy-four  made  by  section one of this act shall expire on the same
   16  date as such act expires and shall not affect the expiration of such act
   17  as provided in section 17 of chapter  576  of  the  laws  of  1974;  and
   18  provided  that  the  amendments  to section six of the emergency housing
   19  rent control law made by section two of this act  shall  expire  on  the
   20  same  date  as  such  law expires and shall not affect the expiration of
   21  such law as provided in subdivision 2 of section 1 of chapter 274 of the
   22  laws of 1946.
